summary: Implementation of the TAHIN (Attention‑based Heterogeneous Graph Neural Network) framework, comprising a hierarchical attention layer, relational aggregation, and semantic attention modules, along with data loading utilities, a training driver, and evaluation helpers for building and assessing recommendation models on heterogeneous graph data.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use solution for building high‑performance recommendation systems that leverage heterogeneous graph structures and attention mechanisms, enabling faster experimentation and deployment of state‑of‑the‑art graph‑based recommendation algorithms.
